name: thorium
description: - Create a group database `groupXDatabase`. You can clean the db you previously used and resue that. - This time each group should have a *single git branch*. Coordinate amongst yourselves by ensuring every next person pulls the code last pushed by a team mate. You branch will be checked as part of the demo. Branch name should follow the naming convention `project/booksManagementGroupX` - Follow the naming conventions exactly as instructed.
